product_description: A cutoff version of Madewell's nonstretch mom jeans, these white denim shorts hit high on the waist with an easy fit through the hips (it's a cool look).
product_details_and_care:
A cutoff version of Madewell's nonstretch mom jeans, these white denim shorts hit high on the waist with an easy fit through the hips (it's a cool look).
2 1/2" inseam; 25" leg opening; 12 1/2" front rise; 16" back rise (size 29)
Zip fly with button closure
Five-pocket style
100% cotton
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
